label: Organization & Formatting
description: All formatting guidelines are followed; YAML is correct with all team members listed.

label: Organization & Formatting
description: Most formatting guidelines are followed; YAML is correct with all team members listed.

label: Organization & Formatting
description: Several or all formatting guidelines not followed; YAML contains elements that aren't updated from the template. Some template text / content remains in submitted proposal.

label: Abstract
description: Abstract clearly defines the product, product attributes, and design decision variables.

label: Abstract
description: Abstract defines the product, product attributes, and design decision variables, but some components are unclear.

label: Abstract
description: Abstract is missing a component: product, product attributes, or design decision variables.

label: Introduction
description: Includes a description of the product with some background content and a picture / diagram.

label: Introduction
description: Includes a description of the product with limited background content and a poor quality picture / diagram.

label: Introduction
description: Includes a description of the product with little to no background content and / or is missing a picture / diagram.

label: Market Opportunity
description: Clearly identifies customer, competitors, and estimated market size.

label: Market Opportunity
description: Identifies customer, competitors, and estimated market size, but parts are unclear.

label: Market Opportunity
description: Section is missing a key component: customer, competitors, or estimated market size.

label: Product Attributes
description: All product attributes being considered are listed and well-described; metrics and level ranges are specified; diagram is appropriately labeled; product attribute table is well-defined.

label: Product Attributes
description: All product attributes being considered are listed; metrics and level ranges are not all specified; diagram is poorly labeled; product attribute table is not well-defined.

label: Product Attributes
description: Product attributes are listed, but some key ones are missing; metrics and level ranges are not specified; diagram is not labeled; product attribute table is poorly-defined or missing.

label: Research Questions
description: Research questions are clear and well thought out; questions directly relate to product attributes / policies being considered.

label: Research Questions
description: Research questions are acceptable, but could be improved; questions relate to product attributes / policies being considered, but some connections arenâ€™t clear.

label: Research Questions
description: Research questions are poorly thought out and / or unrelated to the product attributes / policies being considered.

label: Questions
description: Includes at leaset three thoughtful questions.

label: Questions
description: Includes one or two thoughtful questions.

label: Questions
description: Includes few or no questions.

label: Writing Quality
description: Writing is clear, concise, and logically-structured; ideas are easily understood.

label: Writing Quality
description: Writing is clear but verbose and the structure could be improved; ideas are mostly easily understood.

label: Writing Quality
description: Writing is not clear, verbose, and poorly-structured; ideas are not easily understood.
